text: It is made a condition of this will that my house and lot at [Address-1], as described in deed recorded in Deed Book 52, page 176, Register's Office of Lauderdale County, shall not be sold so long as at least two of my devisees are living.

texts: my house and lot at [Address-1], as described in deed recorded in Deed Book 52, page 176, Register's Office of Lauderdale County, shall not be sold
